name: Denis Charelli
description: I am a man of simplicity, honesty and sincerity. I believe we are all here seeking a friend and someone we indeed to know, learn more about and eventually grow old with. I am a fun loving man, passionate and caring. I also believe everyone has the right to love and be loved.I am Denis by name just as you already know, I was born in U.K. Mom from USA Dad from Italy. I am America and i am 54 This October, I have two kids 17 and 15. I separated from the mother of my kids 6 years ago, she passed away two years after.
